metadata.title: CVE-2018-2758 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent:Server : Security : Privileges). Supported versions that are affected are5.6.39 and prior and 5.7.21 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerabilityallows low privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocolsto compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability canresult in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatablecrash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 6.5 (Availabilityimpacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-5.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
